input.name: data
input.description: The datatable containing columns to be summed.

input.name: start value
input.description:
The start value of the series.
If unspecified, defaults to `0`.

input.name: previous coefficient
input.description:
The coefficient applied to the previous value.
If unspecified, defaults to `1`.

input.name: current coefficient
input.description:
The coefficient applied to the current value.
If unspecified, defaults to `1`.

output.name: data
output.description: A datatable with the updated columns.
